title: Person of Interest - Season 1 - Opening Intro
author: GotPilot
comment: Absolute most underrated show OF ALL TIME.

Wonderfully written, scripted and acted, Person of Interest was a largely unappreciated gem, one which I just watched again from start to finish over the last several weeks.  To Finch, Reece, Carter, Fusco, Shaw ... yeah, you, too, Root ... thank you for superlative entertainment.

I just started watching this show on Netflix, and I love it!  

But if anybody is watching me, they are fucking bored. 😂

Awww, season 1. The good old days of POI. I hated when they killed Carter off, it was never the same and I couldn't watch anymore but those first 3 and a half seasons were truly golden television. Back when CBS actually had original programming and not just rebooting classic shows lol.
Great show, but I wish it had been on HBO rather than CBS...
